name: Golden Amnesty
description:
All the achievements that man pursues are exhausting.  running around, chasing for nothing, until they knew that the one they should be chasing was nearby.  Forgiven by the universe.

In my opinion, the closest thing is the unseen and unseen thing.  The things that are often with us are the things we never miss.  It is very painful for the universe, if the universe can feel pain.

We never know, that the universe is waiting for us to realize everything, that the highest achievement is the blessing of the universe, which forgives our every mistake, past, present, and future.
